firesignal.label: firesignal(Signal, Args);
firesignal.description: Fires all the connections connected to the signal Signal with Args.

getsenv.label: getsenv(localscript);
getsenv.description: Returns the global environment table of LocalScript script.

checkcaller.label: checkcaller();
checkcaller.description:
Returns true if the current thread is a EBON thread.
Note: Checkcaller does NOT check the call stack of the function, if you call a game function then it calls out to checkcaller, the result will be true! Be careful.

queue_on_teleport.label: queue_on_teleport(code);
queue_on_teleport.description: Executes code after player is teleported.

gethwid.label: gethwid();
gethwid.description: Returns the User's HWID, changes between PCs.

message.label: message(text);
message.description: Creates a message box with parameters text

setfflag.label: setfflag(FFlag, Value);
setfflag.description: Sets FFlag with Value. Must be run before the game loads, auto execute recommended.

getinstances.label: getinstances();
getinstances.description: Returns a list of all instances within the game.

getcallingscript.label: checkcaller();
getcallingscript.description: Gets the script that is calling this function.

firetouchinterest.label: firetouchinterest(Part, ToTouch, Toggle);
firetouchinterest.description:
Fakes a .Touched event to ToTouch with Part.
The Toggle argument must be either 0 or 1 (for fire/un-fire).

getrenv.label: getrenv();
getrenv.description: Returns the global environment for the LocalScript state.

newcclosure.label: newcclosure(lclosure);
newcclosure.description:
Takes an lclosure (Lua function) and returns a new cclosure (C function).
This is commonly used when setting the metamethods of a Roblox userdata such as game.

randomstring.label: randomstring(num);
randomstring.description: Return a random string with num length.

request.label: request(options);
request.description: Sends a http request with parameters in options.

readfile.label: readfile(file);
readfile.description: Returns the content of the file.

loadstring.label: loadstring(chunk, chunk_name);
loadstring.description:
Loads chunk as a Lua function with optional chunk_name and returns it if compilation is successful.
Otherwise, if an error has occurred during compilation, nil followed by the error message will be returned.

setthreadcontext.label: setthreadcontext(level);
setthreadcontext.description: Sets the current thread’s context level to level.

getthreadcontext.label: getthreadcontext();
getthreadcontext.description: Returns the current thread’s security context level.

setthreadidentity.label: setthreadidentity(level);
setthreadidentity.description: Sets the current thread’s level to level.

getthreadidentity.label: getthreadidentity();
getthreadidentity.description: Returns the current thread’s security level.

mousescroll.label: mousescroll(px);
mousescroll.description: Scrolls the mouse wheel virtually by px pixels.

hookfunction.label: hookfunction(old, hook);
hookfunction.description:
Hooks function old, replacing it with the function hook.
The old function is returned, you must use this function in order to call the original function.

listfiles.label: listfiles(folder);
listfiles.description: Returns a table of files in folder.

keyrelease.label: keyrelease();
keyrelease.description:
Releases key on the keyboard. You can access the key values from the link below.
 https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/win32/inputdev/virtual-key-codes

keytap.label: keytap(keycode);
keytap.description: Simulates a button tap for the specified keycode. Only works when roblox is focused.

rconsoleinfo.label: rconsoleinfo(msg);
rconsoleinfo.description: Prints msg into the console, with a info text before it.

rconsolename.label: rconsolename(title);
rconsolename.description: Sets the currently allocated console title to title.

mouse1release.label: mouse1release();
mouse1release.description: Simulates the left mouse button being released. Commonly used after calling mouse1press().

getnilinstances.label: getnilinstances();
getnilinstances.description: Returns all the nil instances in the game.

islclosure.label: islclosure(f);
islclosure.description: Returns true if f is an LClosure. Otherwise returns false.

rconsolewarn.label: rconsolewarn(msg);
rconsolewarn.description: Prints msg into the console, with a warning text before it.

mouse1click.label: mouse1click();
mouse1click.description: Simulates the left mouse button being clicked one time.

mouse2press.label: mouse2press();
mouse2press.description: Clicks down on the right mouse button.

sethiddenproperty.label: sethiddenproperty(Object, Property, Value);
sethiddenproperty.description: Sets the hidden property Property with Value from Object. Errors if the property does not exist.

saveinstance.label: saveinstance();
saveinstance.description: Saves the game as a roblox studio file, can be found in the workspace folder.

gethiddenproperty.label: gethiddenproperty(object, property);
gethiddenproperty.description: Returns the hidden property Property from Object. Errors if the property does not exist.

getgenv.label: getgenv();
getgenv.description: Returns the environment that will be applied to each script ran by the executor.

rconsoleprint.label: rconsoleprint();
rconsoleprint.description: Prints message into the console. Does not supports colors.

getgc.label: getgc();
getgc.description: Returns a table containing Lua’s garbage collector.

mousemoverel.label: mousemoverel(x, y);
mousemoverel.description:
Moves the mouse by x and y relative to the mouse’s current position.
Keep in mind that a positive y value moves the mouse down.

iscclosure.label: iscclosure(closure);
iscclosure.description: Returns a boolean that tells you if closure is a C closure (true) or a Lua closure (false)

keypress.label: keypress(keycode);
keypress.description: Continuously presses the key indicated by keycode until keyrelease is called with the same keycode.

mouse1press.label: mouse1press();
mouse1press.description: Simulates a left mouse button press without releasing it.

isrbxactive.label: isrbxactive();
isrbxactive.description: Returns true if roblox is focused, otherwise returns false.

setreadonly.label: setreadonly(t, b);
setreadonly.description: Sets t's readonly value to b.

fireclickdetector.label: fireclickdetector(d);
fireclickdetector.description: Simulates a click on ClickDetector d.

mouse2release.label: mouse2release();
mouse2release.description: Simulates the right mouse button being released. This is commonly used after calling mouse2press().

mouse2click.label: mouse2click();
mouse2click.description: Simulates the right mouse button being clicked one time.

writefile.label: writefile(filename, data);
writefile.description:
Writes data to a file called filename in the workspace folder.
 If the file already exists, the file is overwritten. This function is restricted to the workspace folder.

debug.setmetatable.label: debug.setmetatable(val);
debug.setmetatable.description: Retrieve the metatable of value irregardless of value's metatable's __metatable field. Returns nil if it doesn't exist.

debug.getmetatable.label: debug.getmetatable(val);
debug.getmetatable.description: Retrieve the metatable of value irregardless of value's metatable's __metatable field. Returns nil if it doesn't exist.

debug.profileend.label: debug.profileend();
debug.profileend.description: Stops a profile created with debug.profilebegin.

debug.profilebegin.label: debug.profilebegin(label);
debug.profilebegin.description: Starts a profiler under the label label.

debug.traceback.label: debug.traceback(message, level);
debug.traceback.description:
Returns a string with a traceback of the call stack at level (stack level 1 if not provided).
You can also include a message to append to the start of the traceback with the message argument.

debug.getinfo.label: debug.getinfo(f);
debug.getinfo.description:
Returns a table containing the following information about the function:
 + source - The name of the script the function was defined in
+ what - Where the function originates from (Lua or C/C++)
+ func - The passed in function
+ short_src - The name of the script in a format that can be used in error messages
+ name - The name of the function
+ nups - The number of upvalues in the function
Although more information is given, that information is pointless since it has the same values for every function.

Drawing.new.label: Drawing.new(type);
Drawing.new.description: Creates a new drawing object with type. Returns the object.

globals.get_player_by_name.label: globals.get_player_by_name(username);
globals.get_player_by_name.description: Gets a player by their display name or username.

globals.remote_spy.label: globals.remote_spy();
globals.remote_spy.description: Runs a remote spy supported by globals.

globals.teleport.label: globals.teleport(vector3);
globals.teleport.description: Teleports the local player to a position

globals.is_player_alive.label: globals.is_player_alive(username);
globals.is_player_alive.description: Checks if a player is alive.

globals.teleport_to_player.label: globals.teleport_to_player(username);
globals.teleport_to_player.description: Teleports the local player to the position of the target player.

globals.get_distance.label: globals.get_distance(username);
globals.get_distance.description: Calculates the distance between two players.
